"Yes, you have seen him?" said Prince An- drew. "Well, what is Bonaparte like? How did he impress you?" 
"Yes, I saw him, and am convinced that he fears nothing so much as a general engage- ment," repeated Dolgonikov, evidently priz- ing this general conclusion which he had ar-
